directions: In a small bowl combine all the spices; thyme, marjoram, 1/4 teaspoon of the salt and pepper.
Brush a large saucepan with oil and heat till hot.
Add the chicken legs in a single layer and sprinkle the spice mixture over the chicken legs.
Cover and cook over medium low heat for around 12 minutes.
Flip the chicken legs over cover again and cook for another 12 minutes.
Move the legs to a large plate and tent with foil
To the sauce pan add the vinegar and wine bring the mixture to a boil for 30 seconds.
Add the scallions, water and garlic and the rest of the salt and pepper.
Boil for 2 minutes and drizzle of the chicken legs
1292.ingredients:
1/4 cup
                            - balsamic vinegar 
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - black pepper 
 6 whole
                            - chicken legs skinless
 12 cloves
                            - garlic thinly sliced
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - kosher salt 
 1 teaspoon
                            - marjoram dried
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - olive oil extra virgin
 1/4 cup
                            - red wine dry
 3 whole
                            - scallions chopped
 1 teaspoon
                            - thyme leaves dried
 1/3 cup
                            - water
1292.title: Sauteed Garlic Chicken Legs

directions: Preheat the grill for low heat or the broil on low.
In a bowl, mix the blue cheese, butter, and chives. Set aside.
In a separate bowl, mix the black pepper, garlic salt, onion powder, and cayenne pepper.
Rub the steak with olive oil. Coat both sides of the meat with the spice mixture, and rub in by hand or press with a spatula.
Lightly oil the grill grate. Place meat on the grill or in the broiller, and cook 10 to 15 minutes per side, or to desired doneness.
Grill to rare or medium rare for best flavor.
Remove from grill, and slice lengthwise into thin strips. Top with a large dollop of blue cheese butter, and serve.
2137.ingredients:
2 pounds
                            - beef flank steak 
 1 tablespoon
                            - black pepper 
 4 tablespoons
                            - blue cheese crumbles
 1 stick
                            - butter softend
 1/4 tablespoons
                            - cayenne pepper 
 1 tablespoon
                            - chives fresh
 1 tablespoon
                            - garlic salt 
 2 tablespoons
                            - olive oil 
 1 tablespoons
                            - onion powder
2137.title: London Broil With Blu

directions: Mix all the ingredients together in a bowl until well blended. Form into a ball and let sit in the fridge for at least 2 hours to set. Serve with graham crackers
6396.ingredients:
2 tablespoons
                            - brown sugar 
 1 stick
                            - butter softend
 1 cup
                            - chocolate chips mini
 8 ounce
                            - cream cheese softend
 1 box
                            - graham crackers 
 1/2 cup
                            - powder sugar 
 1/2 teaspoon
                            - vanilla extract
6396.title: Cheesecake Dip
